Name: Welcome to Paradise
About the game: This wonderful place is full of sun, hot girls and beautiful views. Your adventure starts on the island. You can explore it or climb to the top of the cliff. If youâ€™ll manage to reach the top, there will be a reward waiting for you - a horny, sexy girl! Furthermore, there will be a magic orb - collect them four and use to open the portal to a mermaid caves... Go on a zipline ride from the cliff stright to the ship. Jump into the water and use magic orbs. Get closer to the mermaid symbol which corresponds to the collected magic ORB. You will start one of the lasers needed to open the portal. Collect all orbs to Teleport yourself into the mermaid caves, admire them and listen to their beautiful songs! We created this experience for your relaxation. If you do not like climbing you can always having fun with girls! You have full control over them and you can change their animations and positions. Game designed for virtual reality with full support of roomscale.
